short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Appends text to the prompt textarea on OpenAI Chat with urls using: https://chat.openai.com/?prompt=Hello+World

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension prefills the prompt box in ChatGPT based on text in a url. For example, if you visit https://chat.openai.com/?prompt=Hello+world, the extension will automatically append "Hello world" to the textarea in the chat.
